SELECT DISTINCT m.perms FROM sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id=r.id LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON ur.role_id=rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m ON rm.menu_id = m.id
WHERE ur.user_id=#{userId} AND r.is_deleted=0 AND r.status=1 AND m.is_deleted=0 AND m.menu_type = 'button';

SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.path, m.component, m.is_frame, m.menu_sort, m.visible FROM sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id=r.id LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON ur.role_id=rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m ON rm.menu_id = m.id
WHERE ur.user_id=#{userId} AND r.is_deleted=0 AND r.status=1 AND m.is_deleted=0 AND m.menu_type IN ('menu','directory');
